description:
rectangles where text should be.
using ubuntu cinamon 2024

It does exactly what it says. Displays 3d models reliably. I like the layering slider on the side. However, options are very limitied, even non-existant. I would appriciate an option to change the color of the model. The icon to open a file is a download icon, which is confusing at first. It would be much better if it simply said 'open.' One last grudge I have (it maybe due to my system) is that I cannot set it to open as default when double clicking a file in file manager. Perhaps add an option in the app to make it defualt? However, over all, a very simple and usable viewer. 4 stars.
summary: Great app, could use some improvements
